name: Windmill
description: A renewable energy source that generates power from wind.

name: Nuclear Plant
description: A high-output power generator that requires water for cooling.

name: Solar Panel
description: A clean energy source that generates power from sunlight.

name: Coal Plant
description: A traditional power plant that burns coal to generate electricity.

name: Data Rack
description: Houses servers and networking equipment. Requires power and water cooling to prevent overheating.

name: Circuit Breaker Building
description: Distributes power safely to connected components. Prevents overloading and protects connected equipment from power surges.

name: HackUPC Transformer
description: Transforms and regulates power for data center use. Increases efficiency of connected power consumers by 15%.

name: Water Treatment
description: Processes and purifies water for data center use. Increases water quality and reduces consumption in connected systems.

name: Water Cooler
description: Advanced cooling system that reduces heat in nearby components. More efficient with treated water and can prevent overheating in critical systems.

name: Water Tile
description: A natural water source that can be tapped for cooling and processing.

name: Water Tile with Pipe
description: A water source with built-in extraction pipe. Requires power to operate.

name: Power Wire
description: Transmits power between components. Changes appearance when powered.

name: Power Wire Corner
description: Corner power wire for creating 90-degree turns in power lines.

name: Water Pipe Bend
description: Corner water pipe for creating 90-degree turns.
